snippet: The Buffalo Bills, who have had only one owner in their existence, Ralph Wilson, were taken over Thursday by his wife, Mary, less than two weeks after his death at age 95.
abstract: Buffalo Bills, who have had only one owner in their existence, Ralph Wilson, are taken over by his wife, Mary, less than two weeks after his death at age 95.
lead_paragraph: The Buffalo Bills, who have had only one owner in their existence, Ralph Wilson, were taken over Thursday by his wife, Mary, less than two weeks after his death at age 95.
